name: EmailAge
overview: EmailAge is a self-funded private business-to-business company with offices in Los Angeles and Arizona. Our main goal is to provide companies with services around email address risk verification, validation and deliverability using advanced and patented technology, and expertise to provide more than basic email existence information. Our results logic and scoring algorithm in conjunction to our semantic database make our solution not only unique but impossible to match. We utilize secure cloud based tools to validate confirm the existence of email addresses and to determine the fraud risk associated with them. We have more than 200,000,000 verified emails and lots of sources of new data which increases our coverage on the email verification and validation space.
